content:
advertisement

With a week and a half remaining in the Penn State Lady Lions season the underclassmen will soon lose three of their oncourt leaders PERIOD

Off the court however the underclassmen will soon have to say goodbye to their top performers at the video game Rock Band PERIOD

When they arent practicing or traveling the Lady Lions spend much of their time together playing the game which requires a guitarist a bassist a drummer and a singer PERIOD Senior point guard Brianne ORourke said the three seniors  herself forward Rashida Mark and guard Mashea Williams  are the most crucial members toward the teams success PERIOD

 the selfproclaimed  said pointing to herself and her fellow seniors PERIOD

Mark said she was the drummer and Williams said she was usually the guitarist PERIOD

But just as she has played three different positions at times this season Williams pointed to her versatility as an asset to the  PERIOD

 Williams said PERIOD 

ORourke commended Williams for her versatility before pointing out that although Williams diversifies the instruments she plays ORourke is the one who is there for her when she loses PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

Mark said the end of the season and graduation werent going to stop them from playing and getting together however PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

The three seniors came to Penn State as part of the  freshman class PERIOD They have been through four losing seasons a coaching change and a national controversy involving former coach Rene Portland PERIOD

But Williams said the adversity her class has faced as part of the Penn State basketball program has made the three closer PERIOD She pointed to games like Rock Band as proof of the seniors unity PERIOD

Williams said the Rock Band sessions usually start after practice with one of the Lady Lions asking if anyone else wants to play PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

ORourke said Williams was maybe the most skilled overall but was quick to point out that once the game ended she was usually the one with the highest score PERIOD

Mark added while she rarely won she was given the title  by the game most often PERIOD

ORourke said she got started with guitar hero but once Rock Band came out she quickly converted to play alongside her teammates PERIOD

When asked how much they actually played ORourke just laughed PERIOD
